title: Missing fonts in Flash
content:
Does anyone experience this:  
fonts go missing in Flash (CS3) even though they are properly installed and turn up fine in other programs?  
Eg: A huge family of fonts like Helvetica Neue, would have one or two weights go missing when I'm using Flash.

It happens in MS Word too.

I can't tell you how annoying it is. I'm on OSX 10.5.4 and all my software are original.

Can anyone shed some light on this, esp how to fix or work around it?  
I've tried disabling some fonts, but it does not help.
author: karenhuang

comments.content: Have you cleared you font caches? That does the job usually.
